lead_paragraph: Woot is one of a cluster of shopping sites that have sprung up in the last few years in a wave of e-commerce innovations.
snippet: Woot is one of a cluster of shopping sites that have sprung up in the last few years in a wave of e-commerce innovations.

headline.main: With Purchase of Woot, a Daily Deal Site, Amazon Expands Its Inventory
headline.seo: Amazon to Buy Woot, a Daily Deal Site
